su.whs.watl.text

Interface TextLayoutListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TextLayoutEx.TextLayoutListenerAdv
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiColumnTextViewEx, TextViewEx

    public interface TextLayoutListener
    TextInfoInvalidateListener - used for notify TextLayout's holder about layout geometry changes and content updates

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void invalidate(int left, int top, int right, int bottom)
      allow TextLayout to call repaint on anitmation events
      boolean onHeightExceed(int collectedHeight)
      called when viewHeight exceed
      void onTextHeightChanged()
      called, when layout's height changed (this is not called, if layout created with height > -1)
      void onTextInfoInvalidated()
      called, when layout's content changed
      void onTextReady()
      called when reflow finished

    • Method Detail

      • onTextInfoInvalidated

        void onTextInfoInvalidated()
        called, when layout's content changed

      • onTextHeightChanged

        void onTextHeightChanged()
        called, when layout's height changed (this is not called, if layout created with height > -1)

      • onTextReady

        void onTextReady()
        called when reflow finished

      • onHeightExceed

        boolean onHeightExceed(int collectedHeight)
        called when viewHeight exceed
        Returns:
        - if true, reflow() process will be continued

                int top,
                int right,

        allow TextLayout to call repaint on anitmation events
